title: About - Leo Deng - leodeng.dev
aboutText1: Hi, I'm Leo Deng. A passionate developer with a love for clean code, open-source projects, and all things tech. When I'm not coding, you'll find me tinkering with hardware or diving into the latest in AI and web development.
aboutText2: Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js, and more.
footerText: © 2026 Leo Deng. Built with HTML, CSS, and a dash of geekiness.
homeLead: A geeky corner of the web. Exploring code, tech, and innovation.
project1Text: A cool web app built with React.
project3Text: Open-source contribution to a popular library.
